titles.title: 636 From Pole To Pole Let Others Roam (easy sweet)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
From pole to pole let others roam
And serach in vain for bliss
My soul is satisfied at home
The Lord my portion is

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus who on His glorious throne
Rules heaven and earth and sea
Is pleased to claim me for His own
And give Himself for me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
His person fixes all my love
His blood removes my fear
And while He pleads for me above
His arm preserves me here

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
His word of promise is my food
His spirit is my guide
Thus daily is my strength renewed
And all my wants supplied

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
For Him I count as gain each loss
Disgrace for Him renown
Well may I glory in His cross
While He prepares my crown

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Let worldlings then indulge their boast
How much they gain or spend
Their joys must soon give up the ghost
But mine shall know no end
